issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: I would make sure that they contain characters a-z 0-9 and _- (underscore and dash)
fields.summary: Add an additional check to the validity of container and application ids passed to container-executor

comments.body: Uploaded the patch v1. Using the existing container id validation function to check the container id.
Uploaded the patch v2. Fixed a potential memory leak in \{{create_log_dir()}}.
+1 Pending Jenkins. Thank you for the contribution [~yufeigu]
